name: 3taps
description: 3taps is an exchange platform dedicated to keeping public facts publicly accessible. We collect, organize, and distribute exchange-related data for developer use. The Data Commons is open to all posting sources and developers interested in creating fair and efficient markets. All transaction-specific information is available at the same time, to everyone.
